docs.text:
PiBBP.jl Documentation


#


PiBBP
 
 
Module
.


A toy Julia implementation of 
Bailey-Borwein-Plouffe (BBP) alogithm
 for computation of hexadecimal digits of Pi.


#


PiBBP.digpi
 
 
Function
.


Compute $d+1$th hexadecimal digit of $\pi$. 


#


PiBBP.frac_part
 
 
Function
.


Fractional part of a real number $x$.


#


PiBBP.sigma
 
 
Function
.


For integer $d$ and $j$ computes the fractional part of :$ \sum_{k=0}^d \frac{16^{d-k} \bmod 8k+j}{8k+j} + \sum_{k=d+1}^\infty \frac{1}{16^{k-d} (8k+j)}. :$


#


PiBBP.ratio
 
 
Function
.


For integer $d$, $k$, and $j$ compute :$ 16^{d-k} \bmod 8k + j ) / (8k + j). :$

For integer $d$ and $j$ computes the fractional part of :$ \sum_{k=0}^d \frac{16^{d-k} \bmod 8k+j}{8k+j} + \sum_{k=d+1}^\infty \frac{1}{16^{k-d} (8k+j)}. :$  #  PiBBP.ratio     Function .  For integer $d$, $k$, and $j$ compute :$ 16^{d-k} \bmod 8k + j ) / (8k + j). :$
